title: Democrats prime statehouses to rewrite ‘red flag’ gun laws
description: Nineteen states and D.C. already have red flag laws, though many limit who can ask a court to impose gun restrictions on a person suspected of being a threat.

title: How Democrats could use their big Michigan win to set up the 2024 race
description: The party won full control of Michigan state government in the midterms, giving them the opportunity to enact their priorities in a key state.
